newsitem.title: USA: Brent crude firms in late U.S. paper trading.
newsitem.headline: Brent crude firms in late U.S. paper trading.

text.p: Brent blend crude oil prices firmed modestly in late day paper trade in the U.S., according to market players.
A U.S. trading house took one cargo for $17.96 a barrel, 8 cents over the IPE August settlement price of $17.88.
Several partials were reported, with players putting prices between $17.86 and $17.93 a barrel.
A July/August parcel traded at minus 20 cents, while an August/September parcel was heard done at minus 19 cents.
